author: @HillaryClinton
text: I applaud all the hard work of everyone who worked so tirelessly to make today possible. http://wjcf.co/19CkWRy

author: @HillaryClinton
text: I am disappointed in today's decision striking at the heart of the Voting Rights Act. http://wjcf.co/134uLaI

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Bill, Cheslea & I have sent our love and prayers to our great friend, Madiba, his family and his nation during this difficult time.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Having so much fun with Chelsea, taking selfies back stage. MT:@ChelseaClinton http://bit.ly/11BgawY

author: @HillaryClinton
text: .@2SmalltoFail is my new effort w/ @nextgen_usa to help our kids in their crucial early years. We can all act:

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Congratulations from across the pond to the Duke and Duchess! Wishing you the best of luck and a bit of advice: It Takes a (Royal) Village!

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Seneca Falls, 165 years ago today, began a movement that remains the unfinished business of the 21st century. http://tinyurl.com/2ocvxy

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Today I’m reminded of Invictus, a poem Mandela used to recite in prison. You're truly an "unconquerable soul" Madiba. Happy 95th Birthday.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Went to Central Pk Zoo to meet w/wildlife experts about elephants. Their solution: Stop the Killing - Stop the Trafficking - Stop the Demand

author: @HillaryClinton
text: I can't believe he turned 67 today.  He doesn't look a day over four...

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Bill wrote a wonderful letter about BHCCF work. So proud of what's been accomplished, I know the best is yet to come. http://bit.ly/14SL1en

author: @HillaryClinton
text: 8 African nations, 16 NGOs, $80 million, and a path to end elephant poaching. @ChelseaClinton and I are thrilled! http://goo.gl/f5dbYC

author: @HillaryClinton
text: So proud of what we've done and so much more to do. Join me. #Beijing+20

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Something I didn't know until I read her new bio this AM: Secretary Albright plays the drums. Welcome to Twitter @Madeleine. See you at CGI!

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Great 1st meeting with @2SmallToFail Leadership & Advisory Council yesterday. Here's some good reading on the issue:

author: @HillaryClinton
text: .@wef report on women shows progress in 2/3 of countries, still more to do. I'll address on Nov 1 in Philadelphia.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: @WilliamJHague great seeing you today. I'm so pleased that our special relationship continues even after leaving office.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: New profile pic in honor of the International #DayoftheGirl. Join us at the Clinton Foundation in celebrating. http://wjcf.co/17iPRQf

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Great op ed from another @2SmallToFail leadership council member (and a teacher), @cindymccain . Read it here:

author: @HillaryClinton
text: After #SecState Kerry spoke, I sat down for Q&A with @laurawbush, my fellow #AfghanWomen Council co-chair.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: #SecStates 67 & 68 reunited @giwps today. Watching program backstage before going out to discuss #AfghanWomen.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: New op ed by Senator, Doctor and friend Bill Frist, who is on the @2SmallToFail leadership council. Worth a read. http://goo.gl/zBpI6H

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Went to premiere of White Gold @MuseumModernArt last night, a film I narrated about elephant poaching. Coming soon!

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Text AID to 80108 to give $10 to the @mGiveFoundation to help with Typhoon Haiyan disaster relief effort. I'm doing it, I hope you will too!

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Backstage with @GabbyGiffords at the Glamour Women of the Year Awards.  What an incredible woman.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Merry XMas & Happy New Year x 1,002,958. Thinking about the millions who face challenges everyday. Looking forward to 2014. So much to do.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Excited to report Patti Miller (formerly of @sesamestreet) has joined @ClintonFdn to co-lead my early childhood initiative, @2SmallToFail.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: What happens to kids in families cut from unemployment insurance & food stamps? They’re #2SmallToFail, & deserve an equal chance to succeed.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Wishing my good friend the 68th #SecState a Very Happy 70th Birthday.

author: @HillaryClinton
text: Just landed in NY. The Ukrainian government must follow Madiba's example & choose dialogue with its people, not force.
